meanings.sent1: The underprop held up the floorboards in the old house.
meanings.sent2: The underprop was essential for keeping the structure stable.
meanings.sent3: The underprop decided to take a break and the whole building started to wobble.
meanings.sent4: The underprop was like a silent hero, always working behind the scenes.
meanings.sent5: The underprop was the unsung hero of the construction project.

meanings.sent1: He had to underprop the sagging ceiling to prevent it from collapsing.
meanings.sent2: The workers underpropped the heavy beam to secure it in place.
meanings.sent3: She underpropped the table with books to make it stand straight.
meanings.sent4: The idea underpropped his confidence and helped him succeed.
meanings.sent5: Underpropping the structure was crucial to ensure its stability.
